data.eml:eml: A review of the family Eucharitidae (Hymenoptera: Chalcidoidea) of Egypt

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gadallah, Neveen S., Edmardash, Yusuf A., Heraty, John M. (2013): A review of the family Eucharitidae (Hymenoptera: Chalcidoidea) of Egypt. Zootaxa 3717 (3): 389-394, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3717.3.9
